comment.author: 30139994@N07
comment._content: Feels like I am back in time walking along these very streets of St. Thomas.

comment.author: 15223455@N05
comment._content:
Cheonline24, tengo la imprecion  que tu has disfrutado mucho esta coleccion, de esta preciosa ciudad.
Es como estar en el pasado.

comment.author: 89872711@N00
comment._content: I can smell the streets.  a mix of soil and must and a hint of mildew, warmed over with the salty sea air and the scent of heavy vegetation.  not to mention the smells of fish an' fungi wafting through open doors and windows!
